section.name: Apache Portals-Powered Web Sites
section.p: Here is a list of public web sites built with Apache Portals technology. This is by no means a complete listing of all of the Portals-powered web sites. If you have a site to be listed here, please post a message on the Portals General List mailing list.

tr.td: This site lets you see the state of the latest development on Jetspeed-1. It is refreshed from the CVS Head occasionally.
An Indonesian publisher website that has more than 3800 members.
